Service body: The service is faster through the site, because the person who needs blood can tell many of our existing donors, and this is by adding a religion publication, and this is faster and easier than searching in his acquaintances and neighbors to find a donor among them.
Notifications body: Each user shares a post showing the blood type that Faisal needs. At the same time, a notification is given to every user who has the same blood type required in the post, and this speeds up meeting the user's needs.
Communication body: Users can communicate together through the site to get more details and agree in detail on the place and return so that if there is any change in the agreement on the part of the hospital, the patient can tell the donor about that
first: The website, in addition to any mobile application, provides a quick way for users who need a blood transfusion for themselves or their families to reach a donor. It also provides an opportunity for every donor who wants to provide that assistance at the time the patient needs it
second: This is done by registering in our system, and then sharing a post with all the donors who are with him in this system, in which he requests the blood type he needs and the place and time he needs that type.It is also possible to connect with users through conversations. This is done as soon as possible because delay in this case may cost us a human life
